title: About
paragraphs: I'm a front-end engineer who loves building clean and scalable web applications. I work primarily with React, Next.js, Angular, and GraphQL, creating reusable components and intuitive user interfaces that make complex workflows simple and predictable.

Currently, I work at Publicis Sapient on the front-end team for UPS with some awesome people. In this role, I focus on building reusable components, handling complex UI states, and improving performance.

I've also worked on projects ranging from digital marketplaces to mutual fund and insurance portals, building features like search interfaces, onboarding flows, and third-party integrations. These experiences have taught me the importance of writing clear, maintainable code and thinking carefully about user experience.
Outside of work, you'll find me swimming laps or taking care of my plants.
